title: HR Management Practical Competency Enhancement: Social Innovation Project Based on Design Thinking: Mobile Micro-

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can analyze everyday social issues using the design thinking process.
Learners can create prototype planning documents using collaboration tools in mobile environments.
Learners can improve experiment-based solutions at least three times by reflecting formative assessment feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
